cofh.lib.network.packet

Interface IPacket

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IPacketClient, IPacketServer
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ClaimXPPacket, ContainerPacket, FilterGuiOpenPacket, IndexedChatPacket, ItemModeChangePacket, PacketBase, RedstoneControlPacket, SecurityControlPacket, SecurityPacket, SideConfigPacket, StorageClearPacket, TileConfigPacket, TileControlPacket, TileGuiPacket, TileRedstonePacket, TileStatePacket, TransferControlPacket

    public interface IPacket
    All packets implement this.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      PacketHandler getHandler()
      The PacketHandler that can handle this packet.
      byte getId()
      The id for this packet.
      void read(net.minecraft.network.PacketBuffer buf)
      Read the data from the packet's buffer.
      default net.minecraft.network.IPacket<?> toVanillaPacket(net.minecraftforge.fml.network.NetworkDirection direction)
      Creates a IPacket from this packet.
      default net.minecraft.network.IPacket<?> toVanillaPacket(net.minecraftforge.fml.network.NetworkDirection direction, int index)
      Creates a IPacket from this packet.
      void write(net.minecraft.network.PacketBuffer buf)
      Write the packet's data to the buffer.

    • Method Detail

      • getId

        byte getId()
        The id for this packet. The packet id bounds are 0 < id < 255
        Returns:
        The id.

      • getHandler

        PacketHandler getHandler()
        The PacketHandler that can handle this packet.
        Returns:
        The handler that handles this packet.

      • write

        void write(net.minecraft.network.PacketBuffer buf)
        Write the packet's data to the buffer.
        Parameters:
        buf - The buffer.

      • read

        void read(net.minecraft.network.PacketBuffer buf)
        Read the data from the packet's buffer.
        Parameters:
        buf - The buffer.

      • toVanillaPacket

        default net.minecraft.network.IPacket<?> toVanillaPacket(net.minecraftforge.fml.network.NetworkDirection direction)
        Creates a IPacket from this packet. This method is an overload for toVanillaPacket(NetworkDirection, int)
        Parameters:
        direction - The Direction the packet will be sent.
        Returns:
        The new IPacket.

      • toVanillaPacket

        default net.minecraft.network.IPacket<?> toVanillaPacket(net.minecraftforge.fml.network.NetworkDirection direction,
                                                         int index)
        Creates a IPacket from this packet.
        Parameters:
        direction - The Direction the packet will be sent.
        index - The packet index, FML uses this for some things, 0 is fine for most things.
        Returns:
        The new IPacket.
